title: Design of Field-Centered Continuing Medical Education (CME) for Emergency Medicine Knowledge Transfer

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge and Practical Experience in Emergency Medicine
context.additional_context: Non-degree CME course designed with Point of Care Learning methodology for delivering emergency medicine knowledge applicable to clinical settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain immediately applicable diagnostic protocols in emergency situations with 80% accuracy
Learners can reduce the gap between knowledge and practice by 50% through clinical case-based simulations
Learners can improve knowledge update efficiency by 30% using digital platforms (search engines, CDS systems)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
